ch.hevs.gdx2d.lib

Class ScreenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hevs.gdx2d.lib.ScreenManager

  • public class ScreenManager
extends Object
    Handles multiple rendering screens and enables transitions between those screens.
    You can choose the screen to display using its index or automatically switch to the next screen. If the screen index to display is out of range, the first or last screen is shown.
    If a transition is already in progress or if the selected screen is already active, the transition is ignored.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui)

      • sliceTransitionToNext

        public void sliceTransitionToNext()
        Called to transition to the next screen with slicing. Use the ScreenManager.TransactionType.SLICE effect.
        See Also:
        transitionToNext(TransactionType)

      • slideTransitionToNext

        public void slideTransitionToNext()
        Called to transition to the next screen with sliding. Use the ScreenManager.TransactionType.SLIDE effect.
        See Also:
        transitionToNext(TransactionType)

      • smoothTransitionToNext

        public void smoothTransitionToNext()
        Called to transition to the next screen with fade-out. Use the ScreenManager.TransactionType.SMOOTH effect.
        See Also:
        transitionToNext(TransactionType)

      • getActiveScreen

        public RenderingScreen getActiveScreen()
        Returns:
        the active screen which is currently rendered or null is a transition is in progress
